Articles.Content: We know that the Kerbals are living, we know which solar system they live in, but why? This is the question I am piecing together as we explore the past, present, and future of the kerbals’ existence on, “The Kerbol Chronicles”. Basically, use clues and fan made ideas you discover in game or out of the game and we can piece their story back together

I think they are just plants that grew mouths and eyes and other things.   Eventually some Kerbal had an explosion on their back and, obviously, it exploded and pushed them up.

 

Or you could take the back story from Emiko Station.
